body:
Job Description :
CAD Engineer is a growth position within Vegra Info ltd team. 
If you like to draw in CAD every day, 20 days per month, 11 month per year, this job is for you.

Key responsibilities :
all types of CAD conversion according to technical specifications
As build drawings
Drawing maintenance
CAFM data generation
LSP and VBA programming

Required skills :
2+ years of professional experience with Autocad
programming experience using LSP and VBA
ability to understand and work with building & other types of drawings
team player with ability to work under minimum supervision
willingness to take ownership of responsibilities and find solutions to problems
ability to communicate effectively and to build positive relationships across the organization
fluency in English (oral and written)
driving license

We consider to be a plus :
experience with other CAD/GIS platforms
buildings related experience (architecture, construction)

We offer :
An open, not corporate, environment to share and promote your ideas.
Life-Work balance and flexible working hours.
Attractive payment and performance-based bonus.
Medical care benefits.
title: CAD Engineer
